Title: #TeamLucifer
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Ildy Modrovich, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: The team investigates the death of a woman whose body with "Hail Lucifer" message was found lying in a pentagram.
